articles.author: Naazneen Karmali
articles.title: Indian Billionaires Soar To Record Highs - Forbes
articles.description: India sets another record on Forbes’ World’s Billionaires list, with 200 names, a cumulative total nearing a trillion dollars and Asia’s very first centibillionaire.
articles.content:
India sets another record on Forbes Worlds Billionaires list, with 200 names, a cumulative total nearing a trillion dollars and Asias very first centibillionaire.
The Indian stock market is on fire … [+6922 chars]
